name: peekaping
description: PeekAPing is a self-hosted monitoring tool for running health checks on websites and services. It provides uptime tracking, performance data, and alerting over a custom web UI.
features: Uptime monitoring: Track website and service availability with configurable check intervals and historical uptime statistics
Health checks: Monitor HTTP endpoints, TCP ports, and custom protocols to verify service health and responsiveness
Performance metrics: Measure response times, latency, and performance trends to identify slowdowns and optimization opportunities
Alert system: Receive notifications via email, Slack, or webhooks when services go down or performance degrades
Status dashboard: Clean web interface displays current status and historical data for all monitored services at a glance
Custom intervals: Configure check frequency per service from seconds to hours based on criticality and requirements
SSL monitoring: Track SSL certificate expiration dates and receive alerts before certificates expire
Response validation: Verify not just availability but also response content to detect partial outages or misconfigurations
Historical data: Store and visualize uptime history with charts showing trends, incidents, and performance over time
